abstract: In the last several days, President Obama's political allies have made a series of attacks on Mitt Romney's character and record, virtually ignoring the other Republican candidates and the continuing primary campaign.
snippet: In the last several days, President Obama's political allies have made a series of attacks on Mitt Romney's character and record, virtually ignoring the other Republican candidates and the continuing primary campaign.
lead_paragraph: Republicans are heading into an intense period of presidential campaigning as their candidates jockey to be the party's nominee next year.

headline.main: If Democratic Videos Are Guide, Romney Is the Front-Runner
